label: A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-003
title: Cotunnite (PbCl$_{2}$, $C23$) Structure
comments: \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-003}{PbCl$_{2}$ ($C23$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-002}{HgCl$_{2}$ ($C25$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-004}{SrH$_{2}$ ($C29$)}, \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-001}{Co$_{2}$Si ($C37$)}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-010}{SrBr$_{2}$ ($C53$)} all share the same AFLOW label, A2B\_oP12\_62\_2c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
